description: The wholesale price of oil fell this morning, but it's still hovering above $100 a barrel.
title: Gas prices may seem ok now, but don't say we didn't warn you
contentencoded: The wholesale price of oil fell this morning, but it's still hovering above $100 a barrel. Juli Niemann, analyst at Smith Moore & Company, joins Marketplace Morning Report host David Brancaccio to discuss.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Tuesday, July 9, 2013
teaser: The wholesale price of oil fell this morning, but it's still hovering above $100 a barrel.
